game does not work on rgh it freezes plz fix it or write how to fix it i have only rgh and i cant play
great upload. burned with provided .dvd file with ihas drive of course and worked perfectly. thanks

When in dashlaunch press LB and you will be in the setting mode of dashlaunch. 
Next go to Unload Dashlaunch, and unload it. 
Then go up to the launch folder and bring up the .xex file you want to load and the game will no longer freeze on the 0 second mark.

I have a fat 360 that you flashed LT+ 3.0 in order to play my backups.  Since probably last Febuary it hasn't been able to play any XDG3 backups at all.  This includes older discs that had the topology data removed as well as newer ones that were burned with iextreme burner max.  The newer ones that were burned with iextreme burner max and validated with abgx360 always work fine in my black slim xbox.  The difference between the two consoles is that the white fat was banned and no longer connected to the internet whereas the slim is unbanned and everything works fine.  Both consoles have the latest dashboard as well.
So I'm wondering if I need to get the fat one reflashed with LT+ 3.0 or if maybe the issue is with the laser?  This game isn't working either "unsupported disc"   Any ideas?
